Item.Value: [Name:Guild of Merchants Note 1][Text:Hello $Name$. I trust this letter finds you well. Hopefully, by the time you read this, you will have done the basic task of setting up a $WorldObject_112$ as our Merchants have been informed of your little settlement. According to our records, $Actor_36$ will be arriving on Wednesday, and $Actor_38$ will be arriving on Friday. $Actor_36$ has a keen eye for monster parts and relics from before the war, while $Actor_38$ is looking for potions and reagents. I suggest you make yourself ready. Yours, Delian Fortenay, Guild of Merchants][Day:2][Month:1][Year:1]
[Name:$World_Object_38$][Text:Now that we're getting settled in, we need a Town Hall. It'll help with organizing the town.][UnlockObjectID:38][Villager:12]
